entry.name: attributeEquals
entry.title: Attribute Equals Selector [name="value"]

argument.name: value
argument.desc: An attribute value. Can be either an unquoted single word or a quoted string.

entry.desc: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value exactly equal to a certain value.

example.desc: Finds all inputs with a value of "Hot Fuzz" and changes the text of the next sibling span.
